snippet.title: 7 Reasons It's Finally Time To Live In Research Triangle Park
snippet.description: The establishment of North Carolina's Research Triangle Park in 1959 was aimed at reversing the "brain drain" of graduates from the area's top research universities seeking science and engineering jobs in the Northeast and elsewhere. Beyond providing jobs for North Carolinians, the 1965 expansion of IBM into the Park set the [...] read »

snippet.description: America: His to lose.
